name: exactquery/pleasing-filters
description: Filters and Assists with minification, prefixing and compiling of SCSS, CSS, and JS assets.

suggest.leafo/scssphp: Used as a backup to SASSC to compile SCSS.  Will function more slowly than sassc binary.
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: For header responses with better error checking.
suggest.exactquery/pleasing: For serving and caching assets processed by Assetic.
